article: president clinton two years ago personally approved a plan under which the democratic party rewarded some top donors with meals , coffees , golf outings and morning jogs with him and with overnight stays in the lincoln bedroom , to `` energize '' them for the coming presidential campaign .
abstract: clinton pressed plan to reward donors
